com.emc.vipr.client.core

Interface QuotaResources

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockVirtualPools, ComputeVirtualPools, FileVirtualPools, ObjectVirtualPools, Projects, Tenants

    public interface QuotaResources
    Interface for resources that support quotas.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QuotaInfo getQuota(java.net.URI id)
      Gets the quota information for a given resource by ID.
      QuotaInfo updateQuota(java.net.URI id, QuotaUpdateParam quota)
      Updates the quota information for a given resource by ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getQuota

        QuotaInfo getQuota(java.net.URI id)
        Gets the quota information for a given resource by ID.

        API Call: GET baseUrl/{id}/quota

        Parameters:
        id - the resource ID.
        Returns:
        the quota information.

      • updateQuota

        QuotaInfo updateQuota(java.net.URI id,
                      QuotaUpdateParam quota)
        Updates the quota information for a given resource by ID.

        API Call: PUT baseUrl/{id}/quota

        Parameters:
        id - the resource ID.
        quota - the update to the quota.
        Returns:
        the updated quota information after applying the update.
